theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Change the look and feel of the application.

editorTheme.label: Editor Theme
editorTheme.description: Dynamically changes editor colors based on the current image.

exif.label: EXIF
exif.description: Read EXIF data (ISO, aperture, etc.) on folder load at the cost of slower folder loading when using EXIF sorting.

transparency.label: Transparency
transparency.description: Enable or disable application window transparency effects. Requires restart.
transparency.enableMessage:
Are you sure you want to enable window transparency effects?

These effects may reduce application performance.

The application will relaunch to make this change.
transparency.disableMessage:
Are you sure you want to disable window transparency effects?

The application will relaunch to make this change.

adjustmentsVisibility.title: Adjustments Visibility
adjustmentsVisibility.description: Hide adjustment sections you don't use often to simplify the editing panel. Your settings will be preserved and applied even when hidden.

dataActions.clearSidecarsMessage:
Are you sure you want to delete all sidecar files?

This will permanently remove all your edits for all images inside the current base folder and its subfolders.
dataActions.clearCacheMessage:
Are you sure you want to clear the thumbnail cache?

All thumbnails will need to be regenerated, which may be slow for large folders.
dataActions.clearAiTagsMessage:
Are you sure you want to remove all AI-generated tags from all images in the current base folder?

This will not affect user-added tags. This action cannot be undone.
dataActions.clearAllTagsMessage:
Are you sure you want to remove all AI-generated and user-added tags from all images in the current base folder?

This action cannot be undone.

processing.previewResolutionDescription: Adjust the resolution used for editor previews. Lower resolutions improve performance on slower machines.
processing.highQualityZoomDescription: Load a higher quality version of the image when zooming in for more detail. Disabling this can improve performance.
processing.liveInteractivePreviewsDescription: Update the preview immediately while dragging sliders. Disable this if the interface feels laggy during adjustments.
processing.highQualityLivePreviewDescription: Uses higher resolution and less compression during interaction. Significantly increases GPU load.
processing.highlightCompressionDescription: Adjust how aggressively highlights are compressed in RAW files.
processing.backendDescription: Choose which graphics API to use for processing.
processing.linuxOptimizationDescription: Improves performance on Linux systems with certain GPUs.

shortcuts.taggingDescription: Quickly apply these tags using keyboard shortcuts in the library.

descriptions.theme: Change the look and feel of the application.
descriptions.adaptiveEditorTheme: Dynamically changes editor colors based on the current image.
descriptions.exifLibrarySorting: Read EXIF data (ISO, aperture, etc.) on folder load at the cost of slower folder loading when using EXIF sorting.
descriptions.windowEffects: Enable or disable application window transparency effects. Requires restart.
descriptions.adjustmentsVisibility: Hide adjustment sections you don't use often to simplify the editing panel. Your settings will be preserved and applied even when hidden.
descriptions.processingEngine: Select the engine to use for image processing.
descriptions.previewResolution: Set the resolution used for previews in the editor.
descriptions.highQualityZoom: Load a higher quality version of the image when zooming in for more detail. Disabling this can improve performance.
descriptions.liveInteractivePreviews: Update the preview immediately while dragging sliders. Disable this if the interface feels laggy during adjustments.
descriptions.highQualityLivePreview: Uses higher resolution and less compression during interaction. Significantly increases GPU load.
descriptions.rawHighlightRecovery: Control how much detail to recover from clipped highlights in RAW files. Higher values recover more detail but may introduce purple artifacts.
descriptions.processingBackend: Choose the graphics API. Recommended to use 'Auto'. May fix crashes on some systems.
descriptions.linuxCompatibilityMode: Enables workarounds for common GPU driver and display server (e.g., Wayland) issues on Linux systems. May improve stability or performance on some systems.
descriptions.generativeAi: RapidRAW's AI is built for flexibility. Choose your ideal workflow, from fast local tools to powerful self-hosting.
descriptions.aiConnectorAddress: Enter the address and port of your running AI Connector instance. Required for generative AI features.
descriptions.aiTagging: Enables automatic image tagging using an AI (CLIP) model. This will download an additional model and impact performance while browsing folders. Tags are used for searching a folder.
descriptions.taggingShortcuts: List of tags that will appear as shortcuts in the tagging context menu.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.clearSidecarsDescription: This will delete all .rrdata files (containing your edits) within the current base folder.
dataManagement.clearThumbnailCacheDescription: This will delete all cached thumbnail images. They will be regenerated automatically as you browse your library.
dataManagement.clearAiTagsDescription: This will remove all AI-generated tags from your .rrdata files in the current base folder. User-added tags will be kept.
dataManagement.clearAllTagsDescription: This will remove all AI-generated and user-added tags from your .rrdata files in the current base folder. Color labels will be kept.
dataManagement.viewApplicationLogsDescription: View the application's log file for troubleshooting. The log is located at:

cloudService.comingSoonDescription: Keep an eye on the GitHub page to be notified when the cloud service is available.
cloudService.description: For those who want a simpler solution, an optional subscription provides the same high-quality results as self-hosting without any hassle. This is the most convenient option and the best way to support the project.

ai.generativeAiDescription: RapidRAW's AI is built for flexibility. Choose your ideal workflow, from fast local tools to powerful self-hosting.
ai.cpuDescription:
Built-in AI (CPU)
Integrated directly into RapidRAW, these features run entirely on your computer. They are fast, free, and require no setup, making them ideal for everyday workflow acceleration.
ai.aiConnectorDescription:
Self-Hosted (RapidRAW AI Connector)
For users with a capable GPU who want maximum control, connect RapidRAW to your own local AI Connector server. This gives you full control for technical workflows.
ai.cloudDescription:
Cloud Service
For those who want a simpler solution, an optional subscription provides the same high-quality results as self-hosting without any hassle. This is the most convenient option and the best way to support the project.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.setStarRating: Set star rating for selected image(s)
keyboardShortcuts.setColorLabel: Set color label for selected image(s)

generalShortcuts.description: Set star rating for selected image(s)
Set color label for selected image(s)

generativeAi.title: Generative AI
generativeAi.description: RapidRAW's AI is built for flexibility. Choose your ideal workflow, from fast local tools to powerful self-hosting.
generativeAi.builtInAiDescription: Integrated directly into RapidRAW, these features run entirely on your computer. They are fast, free, and require no setup, making them ideal for everyday workflow acceleration.

tagging.title: Tagging
tagging.automaticAiTaggingDescription: Enables automatic image tagging using an AI (CLIP) model. This will download an additional model and impact performance while browsing folders. Tags are used for searching a folder.
tagging.taggingShortcutsDescription: List of tags that will appear as shortcuts in the tagging context menu.

aiDescriptions.cpu: Integrated directly into RapidRAW, these features run entirely on your computer. They are fast, free, and require no setup, making them ideal for everyday workflow acceleration.
aiDescriptions.aiConnector: For users with a capable GPU who want maximum control, connect RapidRAW to your own local AI Connector server. This gives you full control for technical workflows.
aiDescriptions.cloud: For users who want the highest quality generative results, use the cloud service. This requires a subscription but provides the most advanced AI models.

messages.clearingAiTags: Clearing AI tags from all sidecar files...
messages.clearingTags: Clearing all tags from sidecar files...
messages.tagsCleared: {{count}} files updated. All non-color tags removed.

community.title: Community Presets
community.description: Discover presets created by the community.
community.featured: Want to get your preset featured?

noResults.title: No Results Found
noResults.search: Could not find an image based on filename or tags.
noResults.filter: No images found that match your filter.

welcome.continueWhereLeftOff: Continue where you left off or start a new session.
welcome.noFolderOpened: A blazingly fast, GPU-accelerated RAW image editor. Open a folder to begin.

basic.resetTooltip: Click or double-click to reset to Basic

color.whiteBalancePickerTooltip: White Balance Picker (Click to pick a neutral grey area)

presets.title: Presets
presets.saveCurrentSettings: Save current settings as new preset
presets.noPresetsSaved: No presets saved yet. Create your own, import from a file, or explore community presets.
